info.name: TranSMART 17.1 - REST API V2 - V6
info.description: Testing scripts used by The Hyve to verify the 17.1 project API calls

request.description: Using the glowingbear credentials we get an Oauth token to allow this REST client to use our credentials to access the tranSMART database.

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: Via
header.description: Informs the client of proxies through which the response was sent.

header.name: X-Application-Context
header.description: Custom header

item.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept and gene

request.url: {{url}}/v2/high_dim?biomarker_constraint={type: BiomarkerConstraint, biomarkerType: "genes", params: {names: ['TP53']}}&assay_constraint={type: ConceptConstraint, path: "\\Public Studies\\CLINICAL_TRIAL_HIGHDIM\\High Dimensional data\\Expression Lung\\"}
request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept, filtered by gene symbol TP53, linked to gene id 7157 (in this case synthetically linked to probes 1007_s_at and 117_at)

item.name: query high dimensional observations for a concept and projection

request.url: {{url}}/v2/high_dim?projection=zscore&assay_constraint={type: ConceptConstraint, path: "\\Public Studies\\CLINICAL_TRIAL_HIGHDIM\\High Dimensional data\\Expression Lung\\"}
request.description: Return all high dimensional observations for a concept and a certain projection

item.name: query categorical observations for big study

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?constraint={ "type": "Combination", "operator": "or", "args": [ { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\A\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\B\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\C\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\D\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\E\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\F\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\G\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\H\\" } ] }
request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations/count?constraint={ "type": "Combination", "operator": "or", "args": [ { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\A\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\B\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\C\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\D\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\E\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\F\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\G\\" }, { "type": "ConceptConstraint", "path": "\\Public Studies\\BIG_STUDY\\Categorical Value\\Cat 1\\H\\" } ] }
request.description: Returns the count of the number of observations

item.name: query for a combination of concept and value constraint

request.url: {{url}}/v2/observations?constraint={type=Combination, operator=and, args=[{type=ConceptConstraint, path='\\Public Studies\\EHR\\Vital Signs\\Heart Rate\\'}, {type=ValueConstraint, valueType=NUMERIC, operator='>', value=80}]}
request.description: Return all observations for a specified concept, where the values are greater than 176.
